actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow volunteer firefighters a deduction for personal safety clothing.
short_title: Volunteer Firefighter Tax Relief Act of 2008

summary.text: Volunteer Firefighter Tax Relief Act of 2008- Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow volunteer firefighters a tax deduction from gross income for personal safety clothing (including helmets and boots) used in performing fire fighting services.

titles.title: Volunteer Firefighter Tax Relief Act of 2008
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow volunteer firefighters a deduction for personal safety clothing.
